title: Common Law Wife (1961 Hicksploitation) You don't have to say "I do" to be married... 4K

sources.title: Common Law Wife (1961 Hicksploitation) You don't have to say "I do" to be married... 4K
sources.description:
Shugfoot Rainey (George Edgley) wants to trade in his current girlfriend for a newer model... who just happens to be his niece, Baby Doll. Unfortunately for Shug, his older mistress Linda (Annabelle Weenick) does her research and finds out that she is legally his common law wife. He won't be able to get rid of her that easily!

+Bonus audio commentary:  go to settings ⚙️ and select the Audio Track "English Descriptive"

Directed by Larry Buchanan & Eric Sayers
Written by Grace Nolan

Colorized version:  https://youtu.be/_5lD_2jjCeU

Main cast:
Annabelle Weenick - Linda
George Edgley - Shugfoot Rainey
Lacey Kelly - Baby Doll (Jonelle)
Max W. Anderson - Sheriff Jody
Bert Masters - Bull
Libby Hall - Brenda

Release date: 20 July 1961
Filming location: Texas, USA
